title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the detailed requirements for the MicroserviceHealthMonitor platform, including the specific features, functionalities, performance expectations, and non-functional requirements such as scalability, fault tolerance, and security considerations.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the microservices components, communication patterns, data storage, and deployment strategies.

title: Implement Monitoring and Metrics Collection
description: Develop the components responsible for collecting real-time health metrics from microservices, including CPU, memory, network, and custom application metrics.

title: Build Dependency Mapping and Visualization
description: Implement the functionality to automatically discover and map the dependencies between microservices, and provide visual representations of the service mesh.

title: Develop Anomaly Detection and Alerting
description: Create the components responsible for detecting anomalies in the collected metrics and service dependencies, and triggering alerts based on predefined rules and thresholds.

title: Design and Implement User Interface
description: Design and develop the user interface for the MicroserviceHealthMonitor platform, providing visualizations, dashboards, and configuration interfaces.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a CI/CD pipeline for automated building, testing, and deployment of the MicroserviceHealthMonitor platform.

title: Implement Security and Access Controls
description: Design and implement security measures, including authentication, authorization, and access controls for the MicroserviceHealthMonitor platform.

title: Develop Test Strategies and Automation
description: Create test plans, test cases, and automated testing frameworks for the MicroserviceHealthMonitor platform, covering unit, integration, and end-to-end testing.

title: Write Documentation and User Guides
description: Develop comprehensive documentation, including installation guides, user manuals, and API references for the MicroserviceHealthMonitor platform.
